name: Dantes' New Jack City
description:
The Once Sleepy Chicago has been taken over by Mr. Baggo and his evil political criminal syndicate, including members of the city council. Mass Violence, rioting, car lootings, and carjacking's are common and no one is safe. Help Dantès, Paul, and Chase rescue New Jack city in this new action-adventure audio and game experience, inspired by true-life events.  save the accompanying EP soundtrack, Dantès New Jack city here: https://sym.ffm.to/dantes_njc

Game Details:

2 Player Co-Op, Toggle Friendly Fire,  3-Hit Combos, Grab and Throw Enemies, Use Weapons, Destroy Telephone Booths, 5 Challenging levels to go through!

*For 2 players - Must have a connected GamePad.
